dashboard.title: Registration Dashboard
dashboard.choreographyDescription: Register your gymnastic routines and compositions
dashboard.coachDescription: Register certified coaches for your team
dashboard.judgeDescription: Register qualified judges for the tournament
dashboard.pendingRegistrationsMessage: pending registration ready for submission. Review your selections in the summary sidebar and submit when ready.
dashboard.pendingRegistrationsMessagePlural: pending registrations ready for submission. Review your selections in the summary sidebar and submit when ready.
dashboard.allRegistrationsMessage: All your registrations have been submitted and are now under review. Check the "View Submitted" tab to see your submitted registrations.
dashboard.noRegistrationsMessage: Start by registering at least one choreography, coach, or judge using the sections above.
dashboard.noRegistrationsSubmittedMessage: No registrations have been submitted to the database for this tournament yet.

errors.general: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.validation: Please check your input and try again.
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number
